pageContent: Objectives: To present recent data on the epidemiology of urinary incontinence in prostate cancer (PCa). To review the incidence of urinary incontinence, its impact on quality of life and related pharmacoeconomic features.

metaData.source:
Low testosterone bioavailability is related to prostate cancer diagnose in patients submitted to prostate biopsy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21833558/
